welcome.title: Welcome to Dashboard
welcome.description: This is the Overview page of the system. You will see statistics and important information about revenue, customers, staff, and other gym activities.

revenue_card.title: Total Revenue
revenue_card.description: This card displays the total revenue of the gym. You can view current revenue, period revenue, and growth rate compared to the previous period.

customers_card.title: New Customers
customers_card.description: This card displays information about new customers. You can view total customers, new customers in the period, and a trend chart showing customer growth over time.

roles_card.title: Staff Distribution
roles_card.description: This chart displays staff distribution by role (Manager, PT, Technician). You can view total staff and the number of each role type.

revenue_chart.title: Revenue Chart
revenue_chart.description: This bar chart displays revenue by month. You can view revenue trends, compare between months, and see detailed information about revenue in each period.

stats_sidebar.title: Overview Statistics
stats_sidebar.description: This section displays overview statistics about customers and staff across the entire system. You can view total customers, staff, and other important metrics.

branch_list.title: Branch List
branch_list.description: This section displays the list of your branches. You can view information about each branch and quickly switch between branches to view corresponding data.

kpi_leaderboard.title: KPI Leaderboard
kpi_leaderboard.description: This leaderboard displays the top 5 staff with the highest KPI scores. You can view KPI score, completion percentage, and revenue for each staff member.

equipment.title: Equipment Management
equipment.description: This section displays information about training equipment. You can view equipment list, filter by category and location, and access detailed equipment reports.
